statements: SELECT * FROM TheaterFeedback;
SELECT show_name, audience_rating FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE audience_rating > 4;
SELECT show_name, review_text FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE show_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM TheaterFeedback ORDER BY audience_rating DESC;
SELECT show_name, audience_rating FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE show_name LIKE '%Musical%';
SELECT * FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE audience_rating > 4;
SELECT show_name, audience_rating FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE show_id = 100;
SELECT show_name, review_text FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE audience_rating = 5;
SELECT * FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE audience_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT show_name, audience_rating FROM TheaterFeedback WHERE show_name LIKE '%comedy%'
SELECT * FROM audience_feedback;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM audience_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT show_id, feedback FROM audience_feedback ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name FROM show_reviews WHERE LENGTH(reviewer_name) > 5;
SELECT show_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM show_reviews GROUP BY show_id;
SELECT * FROM audience_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT show_id, rating FROM audience_feedback WHERE show_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT review_id, review FROM show_reviews WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM audience_feedback INNER JOIN show_reviews ON audience_feedback.show_id = show_reviews.show_id
SELECT feedback_id, show_id, rating FROM audience_feedback LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT show_id, audience_name FROM feedback ORDER BY show_id DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM reviews ORDER BY review_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM shows WHERE show_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, audience_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT reviewer_name, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT show_id, show_name, show_date FROM shows JOIN reviews ON shows.show_id = reviews.show_id;
SELECT * FROM past_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, audience_rating, comment FROM past_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_text FROM reviews WHERE show_id = 3;
SELECT audience_id, audience_name, audience_age FROM audience WHERE audience_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY audience_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shows;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_time FROM shows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT audience_name, audience_age FROM audience WHERE audience_age > 25;
SELECT show_name, audience_rating FROM past_feedback WHERE audience_rating >= 4.0;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM reviews ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Shows;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM Shows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT critic_name, critique FROM Critics WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT show_name, show_type FROM Shows WHERE show_type = 'Concert';
SELECT rating_id, show_id, audience_count FROM Ratings WHERE average_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Shows WHERE show_type = 'Concert';
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM Shows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(average_rating) AS avg_rating, show_type FROM Shows JOIN Ratings ON Shows.show_id = Ratings.show_id GROUP BY show_type;
SELECT show_name, reviewer_name, review_text FROM Shows JOIN ShowReviews ON Shows.show_id = ShowReviews.show_id WHERE Shows.show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_name, critic_name, critique FROM Shows JOIN Critics ON Shows.show_id = Critics.show_id WHERE Shows.show_type = 'Play';
